By default, your site title will be displayed at the top in Blackletter fonts if your web browser and operating system support Blackletter fonts. Essentially, for every English letter X in your site title, it is substituted with 𝔛, e.g. the Blackletter version of A is 𝔄 (ğ”„). Below are the letters from A to Z:
